definitions.definition: A framework in the form of a passageway of columns that supports a trelliswork roof ; used to support and train climbing plants .
Such a framework employed to provide shade , especially over a patio .

main_definition: A framework in the form of a passageway of columns that supports a trelliswork roof ; used to support and train climbing plants .
secondary_definitions: Such a framework employed to provide shade , especially over a patio .
